title: New: Bondax – Wet Summer
body: Lancaster-based production duo, **[Bondax](https://www.facebook.com/Bondax)**, have just dropped a new tune called ‘_Wet Summer_’. It feels like drinking too much beer on a boiling day, yet still feeling as fresh as the day you were born, it feels like the frizz in your hair after a sudden summer’s tirade of rain, it feels like the street being as hot as the club, it feels like….
